articles.title: 'When you finish the game inside 3 days…': Rohit admits 'India not good enough' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rohit Sharma had no shame in admitting that India were outplayed after they lost the first Test to South Africa by an innings and 32 runs. | Cricket
articles.content: India ended the year that had its fair share of positives with a whimper. In their final match of 2023, India slumped to a humiliating defeat, losing to South Africa by an innings and 32 runs at Cent… [+2593 chars]

articles.title: Temba Bavuma injury update: Medical team says ‘too much risk’ to allow batting in first innings - Wisden
